phases.description: Extract entities, relations, and scientific concepts
phases.input: Question 4:A parallel-plate capacitor of plate area A = 10.5 cm² and plate separation 2d = 7.12 mm is configured as follows: The left half is filled with dielectric κ₁ = 21.0. The right half is divided into two regions - top with κ₂ = 42.0 and bottom with κ₃ = 58.0. Calculate the total capacitance.[Left half: uniform κ₁; Right half: top quarter κ₂, bottom quarter κ₃]
